subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, July 16 (AP) — Never known as lovable losers, cursed or even affectionately as bums, the Philadelphia Phillies have long held a more pitiable title: the losingest team in sports.
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, July 16 (AP) — Never known as lovable losers, cursed or even affectionately as bums, the Philadelphia Phillies have long held a more pitiable title: the losingest team in sports.
